alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Flagler and southeastern St. Johns Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1030 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Marineland to near Bunnell to 9 miles west of Ormond-By-the-Sea. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Marineland, Crescent Beach, Beverly Beach and Espanola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
